hero.title: Welcome to MoroccanOrganica
hero.subtitle: Your trusted source for premium Moroccan organic beauty products.
hero.description: Our company provides different Moroccan organic products and services, including private label solutions for our worldwide customers. We deal with international countries all over the world â€” in Europe, Asia, America, Australia, and Africa.

whoWeAre.label: Who We Are
whoWeAre.title: Organica Group SARL
whoWeAre.description: Organica Group is a producer and exporter of organic cosmetics products, operating outside and inside of Morocco, for wholesale of 100% pure organic cosmetics products. We use traditional ingredients and natural products for beauty, skincare, and haircare.

values.label: Our Values
values.title: Fair Trade Principles
values.description: The business practices of Organica Group are based on three fundamental principles:

principles.title: Authenticity
principles.description: Guaranteed by a personal relationship with the women of the cooperatives.

origins.label: Our Origins
origins.title: Produced by Cooperatives
origins.description: Our products are manufactured by cooperatives in the south-west of Morocco, with techniques and knowledge passed down through generations. All our cosmetics and culinary products are exported directly from cooperatives to our customers all over the world.

cooperatives.title: Produced by cooperatives
cooperatives.description: Our products manufactured by cooperatives of the south-west of Morocco, with techniques and knowledge in this field. All our cosmetics and culinary products are exported directly from cooperatives to our customers all over the world.
fairPrinciples: Authenticity: guaranteed by a personal relationship with the women of the cooperatives
paragraphs: Welcome to MoroccanOrganica, your trusted source for premium Moroccan organic beauty products. We specialize in providing 100% natural skincare and haircare products sourced from the heart of Morocco. Our products are carefully crafted to deliver the highest quality, ensuring you receive only the best in beauty, health, and wellness.

As a leading wholesale company in the Moroccan organic beauty industry, we offer a wide range of products, including Argan Oil, Black Soap, Rhassoul Clay, and Nila Powder, all sourced directly from local Moroccan producers. Our products are perfect for businesses looking to add authentic Moroccan beauty to their product line.

reasons.title: Authentic Moroccan Beauty
reasons.description: We bring you the very best in traditional Moroccan skincare, made with natural ingredients that have been used for centuries.

reasons.title: Wholesale Supply
reasons.description: We provide wholesale prices for beauty stores, spas, and businesses looking to supply their customers with high-quality, organic beauty products.

reasons.title: Sustainable and Ethical
reasons.description: We work directly with local communities in Morocco to ensure ethical sourcing and sustainable production practices.

offer.label: What We Offer
offer.title: Our Products
offer.description: At MoroccanOrganica, we pride ourselves on offering an extensive selection of beauty products that promote natural radiance and skincare. From Argan oil to Moroccan Black soap, each product is rich in antioxidants and nutrients that help nourish and rejuvenate the skin and hair. All our products are free from chemicals, making them safe and effective for all skin types.

partnership.label: Partner With Us
partnership.title: Wholesale Opportunities
partnership.description: Whether you're a small business or a large retailer, we offer competitive wholesale prices and flexible shipping options to suit your needs. Join us in spreading the beauty of organic Moroccan products to the world.
